name: .TIX File Extension
summary: Learn about .TIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by DivX player, a video player program; does not contain data, but exists as an empty file that triggers video download from a DivX partner site; served to users upon payment for a video and deleted immediately after the video starts to download.

content: NOTE: If you manually download video from a confirmation web page link or an email, a TIX file will initially be downloaded. Open this file in DivX player to begin the video download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
